home.about: Welcome to Italy, a country known for its rich culture, delicious cuisine, and stunning landscapes.

rome.about: Rome, the capital city of Italy, is known for its nearly 3,000 years of globally influential art, architecture, and culture.

packages.name: Historic Rome
packages.description: A guided tour through the heart of ancient Rome.

packages.name: Art & Culture
packages.description: Visit famous museums and historical sites.

venice.about: Venice, a city built on water, is known for its canals, gondolas, and beautiful architecture.

packages.name: Venetian Romance
packages.description: A romantic getaway in the floating city.

packages.name: Island Hopping
packages.description: Explore nearby islands Murano, Burano, and more.

florence.about: Florence, the birthplace of the Renaissance, is famous for its art, museums, and architecture.

packages.name: Renaissance Art Tour
packages.description: Explore the best art galleries in Florence.

packages.name: Tuscan Culinary Experience
packages.description: Learn to cook traditional Tuscan dishes.

packages.name: Wine Tour

packages.name: Countryside Retreat
